name: PERPETUAL QUEST
description:
PERPETUAL QUEST is a short mixture of an auto-scroller and RPG, made for Ludum Dare 41 by Robin Field and Billy Hobson. LUDUM DARE PAGE
In PERPETUAL QUEST,  you  can:

- Recieve a menacing letter

- Get cursed by a wizard

- Lack funds to afford items

- Kill Ghosts

- Disrespect the Dead

- Have a sniping competition with a green hooded man

All that and more!

CREDITS:

Programming & Art - Robin Field @robinorwhatever
Music & SFX - Billy Hobson @TuneManBill

CONTROLS:

[Z] - Fire Bow - {B}

[X] - Use Sword - {A}

[ARROW KEYS] - Move - {L Stick}

[SHIFT] - Sprint - {L/R Trigger}

[SPACE/ESCAPE] - Pause - {Start}
